mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.icon, m.sequence FROM sys_menu m ORDER BY m.sequence
SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.icon, m.sequence FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY m.sequence

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.icon, m.sequence FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY m.sequence

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.icon, m.sequence FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY m.sequence

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.icon FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.menu_type = 'M' AND m.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY m.sequence

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.url, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.perms, m.icon FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.menu_type = 'M' AND m.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY m.sequence

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.icon FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.icon, m.sequence FROM sys_menu m WHERE menu_id = #{id}

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.url, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.perms, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.icon, m.sequence FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.parent_id <> 0 AND m.menu_type = 'M' ORDER BY m.sequence
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( menu_name, parent_id, url, menu_type, icon, create_date, perms, sequence ) VALUE (#{menuName}, #{parentId}, #{url}, #{menuType}, #{icon}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{perms}, #{sequence} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu u SET u.menu_name = #{menuName}, u.parent_id = #{parentId}, u.url = #{url}, u.icon = #{icon}, u.perms = #{perms}, u.sequence = #{sequence}, u.menu_type = #{menuType} WHERE u.menu_id = #{menuId}
